Score: 9.5

Score reason

This a complex includes offices, aparthotel, rooftop bar/restaurant, swimming pool, fitness club and a business centre for up to 300 people. Underground parking is included. I met with one of the Investors of the complex and he is trying to attract International companies with very attractive pricing starting from $11 per sqm. They’re offering us the second floor which complete with small offices as per the image.

All contracts are 5/10 years with yearly inflation adjustments.

I find this office ticks all what we are looking for. The price is reasonable while the building should be finished by end of April.

Comments about this office:
